My trip starts at Earth and ends at Pluto. I whow ill need to encounter stations for a refueling at the distances 0.65AU, 1.3AU, 1.9500000000000002AU, 2.6AU, 3.25AU, 3.9000000000000004AU, 4.55AU, 5.2AU, 5.8500000000000005AU, 6.5AU, 7.15AU, 7.800000000000001AU, 8.450000000000001AU, 9.1AU, 9.75AU, 10.4AU, 11.05AU, 11.700000000000001AU, 12.35AU, 13.0AU, 13.65AU, 14.3AU, 14.950000000000001AU, 15.600000000000001AU, 16.25AU, 16.900000000000002AU, 17.55AU, 18.2AU, 18.85AU, 19.5AU, 20.150000000000002AU, 20.8AU, 21.45AU, 22.1AU, 22.75AU, 23.400000000000002AU, 24.05AU, 24.7AU, 25.35AU, 26.0AU, 26.650000000000002AU, 27.3AU, 27.95AU, 28.6AU, 29.25AU, 29.900000000000002AU, 30.55AU, 31.200000000000003AU, 31.85AU, 32.5AU, 33.15AU, 33.800000000000004AU, 34.45AU, 35.1AU, .
